articles.author: Lianne Kolirin
articles.title: Europe backtracks on ban of new combustion engine cars, in setback to tackling climate change - CNN
articles.description: Plans to ban the sale of new combustion engine cars in the European Union by 2035 have been thrown into turmoil after pressure from car manufacturers.
articles.content:
Plans to ban the sale of new combustion engine carsin the European Union by 2035 have been thrown into turmoil after pressure from car manufacturers.
